entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
